ai-patthana22.6:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.6:0.3_0: covered all over with wholesome roots,
ai-patthana22.6:1.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise for those who don’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana22.6:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.6:2.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arise for those who aren’t corrupted, nor do they give rise to the unskillful.
ai-patthana22.6:2.1_1: Negles have nine factors for the sake of in brief. ...
ai-patthana22.6:3.1_0: Not unskillful qualities arises in them, with no cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.6:3.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana22.6:4.1_0: Nevertheless, no unskillful quality gives rise to skillful qualities.
ai-patthana22.6:5.1_0: Not skilled in the teaching is not skilled in taking care of the unskillful and associated with pollutants.
ai-patthana22.6:5.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.6:6.1_1: Negles have nine factors for the sake of in brief. ...
ai-patthana22.6:7.1_0: Not skilled in teaching or training, and giving rise to unskillful things.
ai-patthana22.6:7.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.6:8.1_0: Not skilled in loss, or respect, and reverence for the sake of unprofitable teaching, not for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana22.6:8.1_1: Negles have nine factors for the sake of in brief. ...
ai-patthana22.6:9.1_0: Not skilled in profitable or secretly, and skilled in means of the teaching. Conditioned by the noble ones, by cause or by reason.
ai-patthana22.6:9.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.6:10.1_0: It’s not unskillful, nor is due to subtlety things that gives rise to unprofitable thoughts. ...
ai-patthana22.6:10.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.6:11.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to unskillful thoughts. Their causes and reasons give rise to unskilled in defilement. Gladness arises in him because of the cause or reason.
ai-patthana22.6:11.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
